content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing needs today?
Hi, I think I need some help with a plumbing issue in my kitchen.
I’d be happy to arrange that. May I have your full name, please?
Thank you, Margaret. Could you please provide the address where the service will be needed?
Thanks for that. Let me just verify that this address is in our service area.
Good news, your address is within our service area. What would be an ideal time for one of our plumbers to visit?
Actually, I've changed my mind and don't need the service anymore. Thank you though.
reason: Customer changed mind about needing service.

content: I understand, Margaret. If you need any assistance in the future, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer changed mind about needing service.
